text: Kiryat HaLeom (; The Nation City), also known as Kiryat HaUma (; The People's City), is a big project in West Jerusalem that will include all of the Israeli government buildings and the national cultural institutions. The project is near Kiryat HaMemshala, the Knesset, and Wohl Rose Park, in the northern part of Givat Ram. The project will include a national boulevard and square, and many parking spaces and pedestrian streets. == Other websites == * Kiryat HaLeom in WikiMapia * Kiryat HaLeom project in Archijob website * the National Square project in Kolker-Epstein architects website Category:Neighbourhoods of Jerusalem
title: Kiryat HaLeom
